Welcome to South Vietnam

From bustling Ho Chi Minh City to the tranquil Mekong Delta, South Vietnam offers travelers an unforgettable blend of vibrant culture, breathtaking landscapes, and rich history.

Whether you're exploring ancient temples, cruising through floating markets, or sampling world-famous cuisine, the southern region promises authentic experiences at every turn.

General Vietnamese Guide

Currency

Vietnamese Dong (VND) is the official currency. Credit cards are accepted in tourist areas but keep cash for local markets.

Language

Vietnamese is the official language. English is widely spoken in tourist areas and hotels.

Weather

South Vietnam has a tropical climate with two seasons: rainy (May-Nov) and dry (Dec-Apr).

Culture

Buddhism influences much of Vietnamese culture. Respect local customs by dressing modestly at temples.
